TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SiteMapProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class SiteMapProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 为所有站点地图数据提供程序提供公共基类，并为开发人员提供一条实现自定义站点地图数据提供程序的途径，这些提供程序可与 ASP.NET 站点地图基础结构一起用作 对象的持久存储区。

span.span: Provides a common base class for all site map data providers, and a way for developers to implement custom site map data providers that can be used with the ASP.NET site map infrastructure as persistent stores for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和类表示的抽象的默认实现类。The and classes represent the default implementations of the abstract class. 使用一个名为 Web.sitemap 的 XML 文件来存储站点地图数据。The uses an XML file named Web.sitemap to store site map data. 有关 Web.sitemap 文件上的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 站点地图](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20)。For more information on about the Web.sitemap file, see [ASP.NET Site Maps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20). 类通过声明支持的站点映射提供程序层次结构，概念和属性。The class supports the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, by declaring the and properties. A可以是子任务或其他提供程序的父级。A can be a child or parent of another provider. 这样可以拥有或维护其自己站点图和站点地图提供程序的不同的开发组由实现不同的站点的内容区域的位置。This enables scenarios where different content areas of a site are owned or implemented by different development groups that maintain their own site maps and site map providers. 所有在 Web.config 文件中配置对象。All objects are configured in the Web.config files. 在这些配置文件中声明任何站点映射提供程序已在运行时加载，并且用于加载和处理站点导航数据。Any site map providers that are declared in these configuration files are loaded at run time and are used to load and process site navigation data. 对象，用于跟踪的所有提供程序可供通过其属性集合，提供以编程方式访问管理的提供程序的导航数据。The object, which keeps track of all the providers that are available to it through its property collection, provides programmatic access to the navigation data that is managed by the providers. 下面的代码示例演示用于声明站点地图提供商提供的 Web.config 文件中的格式。The following code example demonstrates the format that is used to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. ``` ``` 通过这些提供程序加载的站点导航数据是其他组件使用的站点映射基础结构，如和控件，以显示站点的用户的映射信息。The site navigation data that is loaded by these providers is used by other components of the site map infrastructure, such as the and controls, to display site map information for users. 如果你实现自己站点映射的提供程序，你可以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 App_Code 目录中放置的源文件，然后将自动编译的程序集。If you implement your own site map provider, you can place the source file in the App_Code directory of your ASP.NET application, and then the assembly will be compiled automatically. 此外可以将自己站点映射提供程序放在全局程序集缓存 (GAC)，并提供对它的 Web.config 文件中的完全限定引用。You can also place your own site map provider in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), and provide a fully-qualified reference to it in the Web.config file. 编译器服务的详细信息，请参阅[使用程序集和全局程序集缓存](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md)。For more information on compiler services, see [Working with Assemblies and the Global Assembly Cache](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写一个实现抽象类类。The following code example demonstrates how to write a class that implements the abstract class. 此示例包括一个示例，仅和示例文本文件，使用它。This example includes only a sample and a sample text file that works with it. 若要运行该示例还需要在 Web.config 文件和.aspx 页面中的条目。To run the example you also need an entry in the Web.config file and an .aspx page. 你可以找到这些文档中属性。You can find these in the documentation for the property. 该示例使用遵循预期的结构来加载站点地图信息的逗号分隔的文件。The example uses a comma-delimited file that follows an expected structure to load sitemap information. 该文件的第一行表示站点地图的根节点和后续行是子节点。The first line of the file represents the root node of the sitemap, and subsequent lines are subnodes. 每个子节点标识其父节点的 URL。Each subnode identifies its parent node by URL. 满足这些条件的文件的示例所示。An example of a file that meets these criteria is shown below. ``` default.aspx,Home,MyCompany Home Page, sale.aspx,Now On Sale,Check Out These Great Deals!,default.aspx catalog.aspx,Online Catalog,Browse Our Many Great Items!,default.aspx ``` `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`中提供的所有示例实现属性和方法。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` provides example implementations of all the properties and methods. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a object to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider and specifies the parent object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写方法，并提供用于添加逻辑具有到站点地图提供商提供由维护的节点集合指定的父对象。Classes deriving from the class can override the method and provide logic for adding a object with a specified parent to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider. 例如，方法将添加由指定的对象`node`到集合由维护对象，并创建之间的父/子关系指定的对象`node`和`parentNode`。For example, the method adds the object that is specified by `node` to the collection that is maintained by the object and creates a parent/child relationship between the object that is specified by `node` and `parentNode`. 默认实现方法抛出异常异常。The default implementation of the method throws a exception.

span.span: In all cases.

summary.span: 获取表示当前请求页的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the currently requested page.

value.span: 表示当前请求页的 ；否则，如果没有找到或不能为当前用户返回 ，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, , if the is not found or cannot be returned for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 然后再尝试检索引发事件对象，启用事件订阅服务器，以返回的实例类。The event is raised before attempting to retrieve a object, to enable event subscribers to return an instance of the class. 如果没有事件订阅服务器，类调用方法使用当前 HTTP 上下文检索，表示当前请求的页。If there are no event subscribers, the class calls the method using the current HTTP context to retrieve a that represents the currently requested page. 如果使用不符合当前请求的页，`null`返回。If the currently requested page does not correspond with a , `null` is returned. 如果启用了安全修整且不允许用户访问，`null`返回。If security trimming is enabled and the user is not permitted to access the , `null` is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现实现抽象类中的属性类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类类必须实现抽象方法。Classes that derive from the class must implement the abstract method. 提供的 URL 可以是虚方法或绝对 URL。The URL provided can be a virtual or absolute URL. 它也可能是使用应用程序相关的语法，如 URL `~/apprelativedirectory`。It might also be a URL that uses application-relative syntax, such as `~/apprelativedirectory`. 确保的任何实现方法分析和正确处理应用程序相关的语法。Ensure that any implementation of the method parse and handle application-relative syntax properly. 类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，使用的 URL作为类所维护的各种集合中的键的对象。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain. 因此，如果提供了一个 URL，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供商提供作用域内。Therefore, if a provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 如果未不提供任何 URL，生成的唯一标识符来标识。If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现类中实现抽象方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用一个名为的帮助器方法`FindUrl`，若要获取当前显示页面的 URL对象。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses a helper method, named `FindUrl`, to get the URL of the currently displayed page from the object. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#5)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#8)]

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，请务必将搜索扩展到任何子提供程序中，如果提供程序不会将与 URL 匹配的对象位于当前站点图，以及提供程序支持子提供程序。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to extend the search to any child providers, if a object that matches the URL is not found by the provider in the current site map and the provider supports child providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用抽象方法来检索对象当前请求的页基于的原始 URL 或请求的虚拟路径。The method calls the abstract method to retrieve a object for the currently requested page based on the raw URL or the virtual path of the request. 如果没有对应中找到，`null`返回。If no corresponding is found in the , `null` is returned. 方法不会检查是否可供用户，默认情况下访问。The method does not check whether a is accessible to a user, by default.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现返回`null`在所有情况下。The implementation returns `null` in all cases. 派生自的类类可以重写方法以提供查找功能基于唯一键 (而不是一个 URL，用于通过方法)。Classes that derive from the class can override the method to provide lookup functionality based on a unique key (instead of a URL, which is used by the method). 实现方法如果你站点地图提供程序实现使用属性对象作为站点地图结构中的主要标识符。Implement the method if your site map provider implementation uses the property of a object as a primary identifier in a site map structure. 类提供处理搜索站点地图节点的未定义 URL 的实现。The class provides an implementation that handles searching for site map nodes that do not define a URL. 类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，使用的 URL作为类所维护的各种集合中的键。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain. 因此，如果一个节点提供了一个 URL，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供商提供的作用域内。Therefore, if a node provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 如果未不提供任何 URL，生成的唯一标识符来标识。If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类类必须实现抽象方法。Classes that derive from the class must implement the abstract method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现类中实现抽象方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`将层次结构的父/子关系存储在一个对象及其所有中另一个对象。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` stores the hierarchical parent/child relationships in one object and all objects in another. 方法执行反向查找同时使用对象。The method performs a reverse-lookup using both objects. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#6)]

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，请务必执行安全修整的子节点上并确保返回的集合是只读的。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to perform security trimming on the child nodes and ensure that the returned collection is read-only.

para.span: 该集合包含仅指定的直属子级。

span.span: The collection contains only the immediate children of the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.SiteMapNode GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes (int upLevel);

Public Overridable Function GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes (upLevel As Integer) As SiteMapNode

param.name: upLevel
param.span: 要获取的祖先站点地图节点的代数。

span.span: The number of ancestor site map node generations to get.

param.span: 值为 -1 指示提供程序可检索和缓存所有祖先节点。

span.span: A value of -1 indicates that all ancestors might be retrieved and cached by the provider.

summary.span: 在站点地图提供程序检索当前请求页的节点并获取当前页的父和祖先站点地图节点时，为其提供经优化的查找方法。

span.span: Provides an optimized lookup method for site map providers when retrieving the node for the currently requested page and fetching the parent and ancestor site map nodes for the current page.

returns.span: 表示当前请求页的 ；否则，如果没有找到或不能为当前用户返回 ，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, , if the is not found or cannot be returned for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现方法返回属性; 但是，在站点地图提供程序可以重写方法并提供使用自定义缓存机制来返回当前优化的实现，以及父节点和上级节点的父级。The default implementation of the method returns the property; however, site map providers can override the method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the current , as well as the parent and ancestor nodes of the parent. `upLevel`参数用于指定的父节点和上级节点检索多少个级别。The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to retrieve. 如果首选，父节点和上级节点可以链接到返回的对象方法，使用属性。If preferred, the parent and ancestor nodes can be linked to the object that is returned by the method, using the property. 类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，缓存在内存中，这会导致很少或没有开销，查询时的整个站点映射特定对象。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, caches the entire site map in memory, which results in little or no overhead when querying the for specific objects.

span.span: is less than -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.SiteMapNode GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes (int upLevel, int downLevel);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNode GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes(int32 upLevel, int32 downLevel) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes (upLevel As Integer, downLevel As Integer) As SiteMapNode
public: virtual System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes(int upLevel, int downLevel);

param.name: upLevel
param.span: 要获取的祖先 的代数。

span.span: The number of ancestor generations to fetch.

param.span: 0 指示不检索祖先节点，-1 指示提供程序可检索和缓存所有祖先节点。

span.span: Provides an optimized lookup method for site map providers when retrieving the node for the currently requested page and fetching the site map nodes in the proximity of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现方法返回属性; 但是，在站点地图提供程序可以重写方法并提供使用自定义缓存机制来返回当前优化的实现对象，以及对象内的当前相近。The default implementation of the method returns the property; however, site map providers can override the method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the current object, as well as objects that are in the proximity of the current . `upLevel`参数用于指定多少个级别的父节点和上级节点来检索并缓存，以及其直接子项。The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to retrieve and cache, along with their immediate children. `downLevel`参数用于指定从当前的子代节点的多少个级别来检索。The `downLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of descendant nodes from the current to retrieve. 如果首选，祖先和后代节点可以链接到返回If preferred, the ancestor and descendant nodes can be linked to the that is returned by the 方法，使用和属性。 method, using the and properties. 如果有较少祖先或子节点级别不是由指定`upLevel`或`downLevel`，仅显示那些可检索。If there are fewer ancestor or child node levels than are specified by `upLevel` or `downLevel`, only those that are available are retrieved. 类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，缓存在内存中，这会导致很少或没有开销，查询时的整个站点映射特定对象。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, caches the entire site map in memory, which results in little or no overhead when querying the for specific objects.

span.span: or is less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值方法仅检查`upLevel`小于-1 的参数和一个`node`参数`null`。The default method only checks for an `upLevel` parameter that is less than -1 and a `node` parameter that is `null`. 因为类缓存在内存中，站点映射信息方法不适用。Because the class caches site map information in memory, the method is not used. 站点地图提供程序可以重写方法来执行父节点和上级节点指定的优化的检索对象。Site map providers can override the method to perform an optimized retrieval of parent and ancestor nodes of the specified object. `upLevel`参数用于指定的父节点和上级节点以从指定遍历多少个级别。The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to traverse from the specified . 如果存在较少的级别的少于请求，所有可用的祖先节点将返回指定范围内。If fewer levels exist than are requested, all available ancestor nodes are returned within the specified bound. 如果首选，可链接的父节点到指定使用属性。If preferred, the parent node can be linked to the specified using the property.

summary.span: 初始化 实现（包括从持久性存储区加载站点地图数据所需的任何资源）。

span.span: Initializes the implementation, including any resources that are needed to load site map data from persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不会实际生成站点图，它仅而准备的状态对象，若要这样做。The method does not actually build a site map, it only prepares the state of the object to do so. 默认实现初始化从站点导航配置站点地图提供商提供的属性。The default implementation initializes the property for the site map provider from the site navigation configuration. 派生自的类可以重写方法以初始化任何状态和从持久性存储区加载站点地图数据所需的资源。Classes that derive from the can override the method to initialize any state and resources that are required to load site map data from persistent storage. 例如，如果派生的类使用文件来存储站点地图数据，任何文件初始化可以执行在方法。For example, if your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed in the method. 如果派生的类使用某些其他类型的数据存储，如关系数据库中，初始化数据库连接可能会执行。If the derived class uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a database connection might be performed. 其他属性，例如文件名或连接字符串，由 ASP.NET 配置系统读取，并将其传递给方法替换其参数。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings, are read by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with its parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法准备 Microsoft Access 数据库连接。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to prepare a Microsoft Access database connection. 连接字符串传入的对象参数方法。The connection string for the object is passed in the parameter of the method. 在这种情况下，由提供程序特定的部分中的 Web.config 文件中提供的连接字符串。In this case, the connection string is provided by the provider-specific section in the Web.config file. 在这里，`accessSiteMapConnectionString`包含承载站点地图数据的 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。Here, `accessSiteMapConnectionString` contains a connection string to a Microsoft Access database that hosts the site map data. ``` ``` 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#2)]

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，请务必第一次调用之前执行您自己的初始化基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to first call the method for the base class before performing your own initializations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当启用了安全修整时的默认行为是下表中所述。The default behavior when security trimming is enabled is as described in the following table. |条件Condition|返回值Return Value| |---------------|------------------| |上是否存在`node`并且当前用户在至少一个指定的角色。The exists on `node` and the current user is in at least one of the specified roles.

- 或 -- or -

当前线程都有一个相关`WindowsIdentity`具有文件访问权限所请求 URL 和 URL 位于应用程序的目录结构中。The current thread has an associated `WindowsIdentity` that has file access to the requested URL and the URL is located within the directory structure for the application.

- 或 -- or -

当前用户授权专门为所请求 URL 中`authorization`对于当前的应用程序和 URL 的元素是位于应用程序的目录结构。The current user is authorized specifically for the requested URL in the `authorization` element for the current application and the URL is located within the directory structure for the application.|`true`| |满足上述条件组成。None of the preceding conditions is met.|`false`|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现抽象的所有类类可以支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念。All classes that implement the abstract class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy. 之外的作用域维护提供程序之间的任何层次结构关系由提供程序本身的集合。Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a collection by the providers themselves. 有关功能的提供程序层次结构的示例，请参阅。For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现实现抽象类中的属性类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于方法类。The property is used with the method of the class. 有关和属性，以及在中定义任何其他属性集合对象，方法将优先于时使用启用本地化属性设置为`true`。For the and properties, as well as any additional attributes that are defined in the collection of the object, the method takes precedence over the when the localization is enabled with the property set to `true`.

[!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#2)]

para.span: 在重写属性在派生类中，请确保实现不导航提供程序层次结构中，如果存在，若要查找站点的绝对根节点。

span.span: When overriding the property in a derived class, be sure that the implementation does not navigate the provider hierarchy, if one exists, to find the absolute root node of the site.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.SiteMapProvider RootProvider { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.SiteMapProvider RootProvider
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property RootProvider As SiteMapProvider
public: virtual property System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ RootProvider { System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前提供程序层次结构中的根 对象。

span.span: Gets the root object in the current provider hierarchy.

value.span: 一个 ，表示当前提供程序所属的提供程序层次结构中的顶级站点地图提供程序。

span.span: An that is the top-level site map provider in the provider hierarchy that the current provider belongs to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现的所有类类可以支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念。All classes that implement the class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy. 之外的作用域维护提供程序之间的任何层次结构关系由提供程序本身的集合。Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a collection by the providers themselves. 有关功能的提供程序层次结构的示例，请参阅。For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现实现抽象类中的属性类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用简单的逻辑来确定是否当前的提供程序为提供程序层次结构的一部分。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses simple logic to determine whether the current provider is part of a provider hierarchy. 如果提供程序是层次结构的一部分，它使用父提供程序为其自身的属性。If the provider is part of a hierarchy, it uses the property for the parent provider as its own. 如果提供程序不是层次结构的一部分，提供程序是其自己的根提供程序。If the provider is not part of a hierarchy, the provider is its own root provider. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#4)]

exception.span: 存在一个对当前站点地图提供程序的循环引用。

span.span: There is a circular reference to the current site map provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能以编程方式设置安全修整-提供程序的配置中设置。Security trimming cannot be set programmatically—it is set in the configuration for the provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventHandler SiteMapResolve;
.event class System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventHandler SiteMapResolve
Public Event SiteMapResolve As SiteMapResolveEventHandler
public: event System::Web::SiteMapResolveEventHandler ^ SiteMapResolve;

summary.span: 当调用 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以创建的当前请求的页，而无需通过订阅到实现自定义网站地图提供商提供的表示形式事件。You can create a representation of the currently requested page without implementing a custom site map provider by subscribing to the event. 订阅服务器附加对象以便接收通知时属性称为，可返回自定义对象而不是一个由默认属性。Subscribers attach a object to receive notification when the property is called and can return a custom object instead of the default one that is returned by the property. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
